org.restlet.data
Interface Reference

All Superinterfaces:
Data, Element
public interface Reference
extends Data

Represents a reference to a uniform resource identifier (URI). Contrary to the java.net.URI class, this interface represents mutable references.

Method Summary
 String getAuthority()
          Returns the authority component for hierarchical identifiers.
 String getFragment()
          Returns the fragment identifier.
 String getHostIdentifier()
          Returns the host identifier.

          Returns the host name component for server based hierarchical identifiers.
